html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08932018-06-22,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-003-GC-125 - Nova Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-003-GC-125 to vary the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-125 held by NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD. This variance would rescind condition 4 requiring that the PACIFIC NORTHWEST LIQUIFIED NATURAL GAS export facility and its associated pipeline be approved and proceeding prior to the construction of the North Montney Mainline project.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Amending Order AO-003-GC-125 - Nova Gas Transmission Ltd.
precis: Order approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-003-GC-125 to vary the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-125 held by NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD. This variance would rescind condition 4 requiring that the PACIFIC NORTHWEST LIQUIFIED NATURAL GAS  export facility and its associated pipeline be approved and proceeding prior to the construction of the North Montney Mainline project.
